law.catch_line: This subtitle authorizes credits for the production of:...
law.text:
This subtitle authorizes credits for the production of:
Ethanol that:
Satisfies the American Society for Testing and Materials Specifications D 4806-88; and
Is denatured as specified in 27 C.F.R. Parts 20 and 21; and
Biodiesel that satisfies the American Society for Testing and Materials D 6751.
